full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,MGON DKAR YID BZHIN NOR BU'I SGRUB THABS BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @005A *, ,(ZHES SOGS MKHAS GRUB KHYUNG POS MDZAD PA'I BKRA SHIS BYIN BRLABS CAN YONGS GRAGS LTAR BYA'O, ,GANGS CAN 'GRO BA'I MGON PO RGYAL BA THAMS CAD MKHYEN PA GZIGS CHEN PO RJE BTZUN BLO BZANG BSTAN PA'I DBANG PHYUG 'JAM DPAL RGYA MTSO DPAL BZANG POS, MGON DKAR YID BZHIN NOR BU'I SGRUB THABS MDOR BSDUS 'DI LTA BU ZHIG BGYI DGOS ZHES BKA' LUNG SPYI BOR PHEBS PA GUS PA CHEN POS MNOS TE, MGON PO 'DI'I MAN NGAG LEGS PA THOB PA DGE SLONG YE SHES RGYAL MTSAN GYIS, 'DI'I MNGON RTOGS DNGOS GZHI RJE BLO BZANG CHOS KYI RGYAL MTSAN GYIS MDZAD PA GZHIR BZHAG KHA SKONG RNAMS GSAR DU BSGRIGS TE, SHING SPRUL MCHU STOD ZLA GA'I YAR TSE STON PA THUB PA'I DBANG POS @005B BDEN BZHI'I CHOS 'KHOR BSKOR BA'I DUS CHEN GYI NYIN PHO BRANG CHEN PO PO TA LAR SBYAR BA'O, ,'DIS KYANG RGYAL BA'I BSTAN PA RIN PO CHE PHYOGS KUN TU DAR ZHING RGYAS PAR GYUR CIG ,MANGGA LAm, ,)
author_simple: BLO BZANG CHOS KYI RGYAL MTSAN,
